examples: Fax machines were a wonderful invention at the time.
Las máquinas de fax fueron un invento maravilloso en ese momento.
He failed to patent his invention and never made a penny from it.
No logró patentar su invento y nunca ganó un centavo con él.
Such changes have not been seen since the invention of the printing press.
Tales cambios no se han visto desde la invención de la imprenta.
After the war, Westinghouse devoted himself to invention.
Después de la guerra, Westinghouse se dedicó a la invención.
